io.dropwizard.jersey.setup

Class JerseyServletContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.glassfish.jersey.servlet.ServletContainer
          • io.dropwizard.jersey.setup.JerseyServletContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Filter, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, org.glassfish.jersey.server.spi.Container

    public class JerseyServletContainer
extends org.glassfish.jersey.servlet.ServletContainer
    Extends ServletContainer to provide consumers of dropwizard-jersey a means of obtaining a container without directly depending on Jersey.
    See Also:
